chat_history: Customer: My internet has been dropping every 10 minutes. This is very frustrating as I am working from home. Agent: I'm sorry. Is the router light blinking? Customer: Yes, red. Contact me at john.doe@gmail.com.
Customer: I see a $20 charge I don't recognize on my latest bill. Agent: Let me check that for you. Customer: It was supposed to be a waived installation fee.
Customer: I want to upgrade to the sports package to get the NFL Redzone. What is the price? Agent: It is $10/month. Customer: Okay, send the details to mary.smith@outlook.com.
Customer: THE TECHNICIAN NEVER SHOWED UP! This is the third time. I am going to cancel my service and switch to a competitor. I am done with Comcast.
